info.title: UBIK Public API
info.description: Publicly accessible API endpoints for UBIK.

get.description: Health check endpoint for the public API.

Retrieves a paginated list of all workspaces accessible to the user.
This includes personal workspaces and shared company workspaces.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of documents within a specific workspace.
Retrieves a paginated list of all documents accessible to the user.

post.summary: Ingest documents from files or URLs
post.description:
Unified endpoint to ingest documents from various sources.

This endpoint can handle file uploads and URL scraping in a single request.
It uses multipart/form-data.

- To upload files, include them in the 'files' part of the form.
- To scrape URLs, provide a comma-separated string in the 'urls' form field.
- Specify workspace IDs to associate the ingested documents with specific workspaces.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific document, provided the user has access.

delete.description:
Delete a document. This will remove the document from the user's default workspace
and, if they are the last owner, delete it from the system entirely.

post.description: Adds a document to one or more workspaces.

delete.description: Removes a document from one or more workspaces.

delete.summary: Remove a document from a workspace
delete.description: Removes a document's association from a specific workspace without deleting the document itself.
